text: so I mentioned Auto scaling applications
store one of our biggest data
technology and we decided to move it to
Dynamo this was the ride location
tracking system so every GPS location
for all of our rides was stored in this
system we moved it over to Dynamo and it
was so simple to scale up you had two
knobs one for write capacity one for
read capacity you didn't have to carry a
pager you didn't have to deal with chunk
migrations uh it just worked really
really well and we've since moved many
of our other data stores over to Dy as
